CHAT.comment: REX R. SPRIETSMA, ADMINISTRATOR OF THE ESTATE OF JEANNE SPRIETSMA, DECEASED, Petitioner v. MERCURY MARINE.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 10:44 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF LESLIE A. BRUECKNER ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
ORAL ARGUMENT OF MALCOLM L. STEWART ON BEHALF OF THE UNITED STATES, AS AMICUS CURIAE, SUPPORTING THE PETITIONER
ORAL ARGUMENT OF STEPHEN M. SHAPIRO ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENT
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF LESLIE A. BRUECKNER ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
(Whereupon, at 11:44 a.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
